spec.name: Zevaco dome
spec.description: The Zevaco Dome (Dôme de Zevaco) is a distinctive architectural landmark in Casablanca's central district. It is a large, modernist concrete dome structure, designed by the celebrated architect **Jean-François Zevaco**. It once housed a market or public facility and is a notable example of the post-war Modernist and Brutalist architecture Zevaco contributed to the city. The dome's unusual form makes it a recognizable urban feature.

people.comment: French-Moroccan architect who designed the dome.
